RelatedSentence: New Delhi , May 19 : The Indian Railways , after receiving innumerable complaints from passengers , is all set to change the timings of Secunderabad - Visakhapaanam Duranto Express , says a Times of India report .
The passengers complained against the delayed arrival of the 22203 Visakhapatnam - Secunderabad Duronto Express ( VSDE ) at Secunderabad station .

Sources say that the timings of the Duronto Express are likely to be rescheduled with effect from July 1 , 2014 , with the departure time from Vizag likely to be changed to 8.15 pm instead of 10.30 pm so that the train can arrive at its destination the next day at around 6.15 am .
The TOI article also says that the delay is due to the traffic congestion at Moula Ali satellite railway station of Secunderabad .
